channel.title: NYS:MCO on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:MCO on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: US Credit Conditions Deteriorate Following Tariffs, Moody’s Says
item.description: Credit conditions deteriorated in the wake of US tariff announcements, with company defaults increasing and distressed debt exchanges dominating the market, according to Moody’s Ratings.

item.title: US Credit Conditions Deteriorate Following Tariffs, Moody’s Says
item.description: Credit conditions deteriorated in the wake of US tariff announcements, with company defaults increasing and distressed debt exchanges dominating the market, according to Moody’s Ratings.

item.title: Tariff Risk Nudged More Firms Closer to Default, Moody’s Says
item.description: The number of companies at the greatest risk of defaulting are at an 11-month high, as uncertainty around US trade and tariffs worsened credit conditions, according to a Moody’s Ratings report.

item.title: Tariff Risk Nudged More Firms Closer to Default, Moody’s Says
item.description: The number of companies at the greatest risk of defaulting are at an 11-month high, as uncertainty around US trade and tariffs worsened credit conditions, according to a Moody’s Ratings report.

item.title: Mexico’s Televisa Cut to Junk by Moody’s on Falling Subscribers
item.description: Grupo Televisa SAB’s credit grade was cut to junk by Moody’s Ratings, which cited falling subscriber numbers that have dented profits.

item.title: Mexico’s Televisa Cut to Junk by Moody’s on Falling Subscribers
item.description: Grupo Televisa SAB’s credit grade was cut to junk by Moody’s Ratings, which cited falling subscriber numbers that have dented profits.

item.title: Oman’s Default Risk Sinks to Record Low After Moody’s Upgrade
item.description: The cost of default insurance on Oman’s government debt fell to a record low after Moody’s Ratings upgraded the government to investment grade. The country’s bonds rallied.

item.title: Oman’s Default Risk Sinks to Record Low After Moody’s Upgrade
item.description: The cost of default insurance on Oman’s government debt fell to a record low after Moody’s Ratings upgraded the government to investment grade. The country’s bonds rallied.

item.title: Oman Raised to Investment Grade by Moody’s as Debt Burden Falls
item.description: Oman has received its second upgrade to investment grade in less than a year, after Moody’s Investors Service raised its sovereign rating from junk.

item.title: Oman Raised to Investment Grade by Moody’s as Debt Burden Falls
item.description: Oman has received its second upgrade to investment grade in less than a year, after Moody’s Investors Service raised its sovereign rating from junk.
